trait.name: Nimble Escape
text: Grabstab can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

action.name: Multiattack
text: Grabstab makes two attacks with its scimitar. The second attack has disadvantage.

action.name: Scimitar
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

action.name: Javelin
text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 3 (1d6) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Redirect Attack
text: When a creature Grabstab can see targets it with an attack, Grabstab chooses another goblin within 5 feet of it. The two goblins swap places, and the chosen goblin becomes the target instead.
